name: Nature Escapes 3
description:
Nature Escapes is back! Enjoy and learn about beautiful plants and flowers from all over the world. Have fun playing a brand new set of beautiful hidden object scenes while listening to relaxing music.

Features

  • 24 chapters of nature fun!
  • Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
  • Fun facts about fun plants!
  • Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
  • Decorate your very own garden!

The Collector's Edition includes

  • 6 extra locations
  • 12 minigames
  • Downloadable wallpapers
  • Music player
  • Additional plants and flowers
  • Explore the developer's own plant children



Enjoy all the various mini-games and complete your own beautiful garden scene!
